thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Transformation you say?!

author: news24.com
title: Transformation you say?!
text:
We all heard what Gwede said about pensioners and loyalty. I'm a proud black man and i totally disagree with this whole transformation stunt the party he's representing are pulling. To be frank I have no problem with the current Boks squad, its actually progress ( 9 black players).
Now tell me how many white players are in the Bafana squad or were in the squad for the 2010 edition of the World Cup... we didn't see anyone complaining about transformation back then and now.
Please stop this ridiculous stunt. A fellow South African who supports the Boks through thick and thin, colour or any other agenda.
